text: The third group (Group 1.3) comprised six healthy untreated SPF cats, aged 36-38 months, that had been euthanased at the University of Glasgow, UK as part of a study performed under UK Home Office Project Licence PPL 60/3735. From these cats, formalin fixed, paraffin embedded liver samples were kindly provided by Prof M Hosie. This study was undertaken on three additional groups of cats. Group 2.1 comprised 18 pet cats (age: 2 months to 3 years; mean age: 14 months) that had died or were euthanased with FIP; the diagnosis was confirmed as described above. See Table 2 .
